title: Which UPSC optional should I choose: public administration or sociology? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: Well, when it comes to the matter of choosing Optional, you've to choose the one which you are more interested in. Definitely there is a lot of competition when it comes to PUB AD, but if you work hard in your own way and try to study it like a story instead of a theory it is pretty much interesting. Just imagine yourself in every topic (Ex: there are theories written by administrative thinkers, imagine yourself in that theory as a leader and how you would like to manage the situation) and it's not really hard to grasp it. Coming to sociology, I hardly know anything about it, sorry I cannot help you with this subject. 1 point to remember, choose any subject which you would not get bored of, coz you have a better chance of scoring more in the optional than in general studies papers. Work out your way of studying the subject. Do not read more than 1 book for each paper, be very strong at the basics of each topic and each subject.Revise as much as possible.Give your best shotALL THE BEST!!
